Subject: RE: group_supply_chain dm_soh_sales 2025-01-27T1216.xlsx

 

Dear Heba,

 

Thank you for sharing the below.

 

I do confirm that the physical stocks at the store and the file you have shared are tally.

I just wanted to highlight that my initial request to have more bags was due to the below:

1- Store’s bag display is getting empty time by time till the moment I have to display nonperforming shoes more than the bags.

2- since we have launched the 60-70% promotion we have sold 150Pcs in matter of just 5days.

3- Out of the 182 bags the full priced items are 81Pcs and the discounted ones left are 101 pcs so it would be great if we can get more discounted items to sell them on the shop floor.

2- since we have launched the 60-70% promotion we have sold 150Pcs in matter of just 5days.

3- Out of the 182 bags the full priced items are 81Pcs and the discounted ones left are 101 pcs so it would be great if we can get more discounted items to sell them on the shop floor.

4- The discounted items left are only 29 SKU’s due to having high volumes of stock for same item.

 

If we can get more discounted bags to rebalance the display between bags and shoes that would be great before we get sold out of bags prior February.

 

Regards,

Omar

 

 

________________________________

OMAR TAMIM​​​​

STORE MANAGER

ALLIED ENTERPRISES LLC

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

‑
